Uses of Interface
com.jme3.input.Joystick

  • Packages that use Joystick 
    Package Description
    com.jme3.input
    The com.jme3.input package is used for all input handling in jMonkeyEngine.
    com.jme3.input.android  
    com.jme3.input.lwjgl  

    • Uses of Joystick in com.jme3.input

      Classes in com.jme3.input that implement Joystick 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractJoystick
      A joystick represents a single joystick that is installed in the system.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Joystick DefaultJoystickAxis.getJoystick()
      Returns the joystick to which this axis object belongs.
      Joystick DefaultJoystickButton.getJoystick()
      Returns the joystick to which this axis object belongs.
      Joystick JoystickAxis.getJoystick()
      Returns the joystick to which this axis object belongs.
      Joystick JoystickButton.getJoystick()
      Returns the joystick to which this axis object belongs.
      Joystick[] InputManager.getJoysticks()
      Returns an array of all joysticks installed on the system.
      Joystick[] JoyInput.loadJoysticks(InputManager inputManager)
      Loads a list of joysticks from the system.
